DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal of this study is to develop and evaluate a brief, video-based, group-level intervention designed to reduce sexual risk taking among culturally diverse English- and Spanish-speaking Latino men who have sex with men (MSM).
DOC.brief_title: No Excuses/Sin Buscar Excusas Intervention to Reduce Latino Men's HIV Risks
DOC.criteria: Be between the ages of 18 49 Selfidentify as Latino or Hispanic Speak English and/or Spanish Reside in NYC and not plan to move in the next 3 months Have had 2 or more sex partners in the last 3 months Have had at least 1 male sex partner in the last 3 months Have engaged in unprotected anal intercourse with at least one male partner in the last 3 months Be HIV negative or not know their status Participated in a program (research or nonresearch) during the past 6 months where they have received HIV prevention education (e.g. an inperson or online group session, workshop, support group). Report being HIVpositive
DOC.keyword: men who have sex with men
